title: Yamaha Arranged FZ 25 Service Fest October 2025 For FZ 25 User
description: In this fest, FZ 25 user can service their motorcycle in the Yamaha authorized service center. This fest will start from 14th October 2025 and will 16th October 2025.

title: CFMOTO Will Introduce New EV Called ZEEHO In Bangladesh
description: It’s an electric Chinese scooter brand based in China. ZEEHO is one of the largest electric motorcycle brands in China.

title: Rev Up Your Heart With Yamaha FZ-X - Test Ride

title: BHL Is Going Arrange Honda Hornet 2.0 Fun & Rock Fest Chattogram 2025
description: Hornet 2.0 test ride, Gymkhana challenge, fun games, and exciting gifts. The main attraction of this event isthat  ARTCELL will perform live.

title: British Stunt Rider Jonny Davies Sets World Record For Fastest High Chair Wheelie
description: British Stunt Rider Jonny Davies Sets World Record For Fastest High Chair Wheelie

title: Yamaha Autumn Ride October 2025 - Cash Back Offer Up To 11,000 BDT
description: In this offer, Yamaha is giving a maximum of 11,000 BDT to a minimum of 1,500 BDT cash-back on their motorcycle.

title: Suzuki Bangladesh Is Giving 20000 BDT Discount On Suzuki Gixxer SF
description: Suzuki always comes up with new offers for their customers. They have the largest motorcycle model line-up in Bangladesh.

title: GearX Bangladesh Launches Limited Edition Billmola Helmets
description: GearX Bangladesh, one of the most favored brands of motorcycle safety gear and accessories in the nation, is releasing a series of limited-edition helmets.

title: GearX Bangladesh To Launch New Bilmola Helmet Series Inspired By Naruto Anime
description: GearX Bangladesh will be unveiling what will be not only exciting to the bikers but also to anime enthusiasts; new series of Bilmola helmets with rare Naruto directed images.
